content: However, strong performance in our education solutions and trade channels drove first quarter revenues to $259.8 million, compared to $215.2 million last year. Adjusted EBITDA for the first quarter was a loss of $13 million, compared to a loss of $15.9 million last year and a loss per diluted share was $0.79, compared to a loss per diluted share of $0.90 in the prior fiscal quarter. Now turning to our segments, in Children’s Book Publishing and Distribution, first quarter revenue increased 25% to $115.8 million versus the prior year period. In Education Solutions, revenue in the first fiscal quarter grew 49% to $80.1 million versus the prior year period. First quarter segment operating income was $7.3 million versus an operating loss of $2.4 million in the prior fiscal quarter, driven by the record sales.
